tokenization module¶

Tokenization classes.

Classes:

BasicTokenizer([do_lower_case])

Runs basic tokenization (punctuation splitting, lower casing, etc.).

FullTokenizer(vocab_file[, do_lower_case])

Runs end-to-end tokenziation.

WordpieceTokenizer(vocab[, unk_token, ...])

Runs WordPiece tokenziation.

class tokenization.WordpieceTokenizer(vocab, unk_token='[UNK]', max_input_chars_per_word=100)¶

Bases: object

Runs WordPiece tokenziation.

Methods:

tokenize(text)

Tokenizes a piece of text into its word pieces.
tokenize(text)¶

Tokenizes a piece of text into its word pieces.

This uses a greedy longest-match-first algorithm to perform tokenization using the given vocabulary.

For example:

input = "unaffable" output = ["un", "##aff", "##able"]

Parameters

text -- A single token or whitespace separated tokens. This should have already been passed through `BasicTokenizer.

Returns

A list of wordpiece tokens.
